page.title: 05LANDSCAPE
page.content: STAWLEY The northern part of our block, where Stawley is situated, is steep hills and deep valleys. Tucks Farm, to the northwest of Stawley, is very old. There are a lot of old buildings there. Close by,at Bennets, there is an orchard. There are about ten apple trees there. By Tucks Farm there is an old track.The track goes through a ford and there is also a bridge. There is an old watermill - but it has no longer got a wheel and is now a house. It has a lovely garden. There is a beautiful little church at Stawley but very few houses and they are far apart.
